website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably-priced set that's suitable for various ages. A great pick for Moana fans and parents who want an affordable set with versatile appeal.
pros: A mid-level set for a reasonable price that features a Moana theme
Comes with Moana and Maui figures with nice detailing
Has an island and boat for an imaginative voyage when the building is complete

customer_reviews.title: Moana was such a great movie that...
customer_reviews.text: I figured I'd get the 2 Moana lego sets (this one and 41149) for my little niece and nephew to enjoy! I love that it comes with great characters (Moana, Maui, and Hay Hay the rooster, plus a couple coconut characters). I really thought the boat was neat. The kids thought it was great that you could store food inside. There's plenty of room for all 3 characters to fit on board. The little island is fun because you can put the stone on the "evil" volcano part and spin it around to make it "good" or "happy" again kind of like the Disney movie! Anybody will love this set!
customer_reviews.author: Brett TTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: "You can play the whole Moana story with this set"
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter explained happily when she got this set as a 5th birthday present. There are a number of lego kits that allow building "sets" and characters from Disney animated children's stories. Despite the "6-12" age recommendation, my two 5 year old girls could do these types of Lego kits when about 41/2. This kit has specialized pieces, some quite small--and a large Maui, but non-readers can follow the instructions for first assembly. The specialized pieces are essential, so plan on keeping the kit in one or more re-salable plastic bags when not in active use to avoid losing essential parts.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: A big hit!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters (ages 7 and 4) absolutely loved it. I liked, too, that there were two main character pieces, so no fighting over the "people". We buy something like this every year to do as an activity the beach house, and usually take the Lego set to live at Grandma and Grandpa's house afterwards. This year the girls begged for it to go home with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 4yr old!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my for my 4 year old, who has been begging for this for a while. She LOVES it. With very minimal assistance, she was able to put it together almost herself! There is a lot of peices and she got bored after putting the boat together. She didn't even make it to the island part before giving up. She has not returned to do that part either. That really isn't a problem with the toy, just part of being 4 I guess!
customer_reviews.author: Pett Family

customer_reviews.title: Moana obsessed kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Cute and fun. My kids love playing with Moana and Maui. They are 2 and 4 so we had to put it together with the 4 year old, but the 2 year old plays too. I only gave it one less star because the island is a little finicky. We are using the palm tree leaves or a random LEGO to close up the door that holds the “heart”. Cute detail too. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: We had a lot of fun putting this lego set together. It took my son, husband and I about an hour to put together. It has Moana, Hehe, Maui, the little coconut guys and Teka. He's been playing with it and recreating the movie every day. My only critique is the little pig is not there, "Pua". He would have made it absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SophieJ

customer_reviews.title: quality time with your kids
customer_reviews.text: once set up, this is fun to look and play with. the instructions to build are very simple. just follow. probably will take about an hour, so have fun and enjoy the moment, the journey, and not just the end! small pieces, so supervise.
customer_reviews.author: Peter K.

customer_reviews.title: Great set that is simple enough for kids 5-6 years old to put together with just a little parental help.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful lego set and great fun for the kids (6yr olds at least) to put together. Love the little details with the food and chicken. Would give it 5 stars, but I'm still blown away at the $40 price tag for this little set. But this is more feedback for the Lego Corp who dictates prices, rather than Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great for Moana lover
customer_reviews.text: Moana is a big hit around our house. This set is great & true to movie. A little tough time explaining to small kids why this boat can’t go in the water. And even harder time keeping up with the little loose pieces. If you have a younger sibling around, this might not be the best LEGO set for you.
customer_reviews.author: skw

customer_reviews.title: Okay but Not Worth $50
customer_reviews.text: The build was fun, but the overall result was kind of bland. There aren't very many play features, and the Te Fiti/Ta Kā play feature and build are especially bland and disappointing. Still, you get some very nice pieces and cool figures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your child wants to play pretend, glue them together!
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. Grandaughter loves,Moapa so she and her brother put together. Only thing as with all legos, unless you glue them together, as she kept playing with them, the legos would separate. Frustrated her as she felt once built it should just be totally playable.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: This set was fantastic. We gave it to my 7 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: This set was fantastic. We gave it to my 7 year old for her birthday. She sat down and completed it by herself. This was her first set! It was great the way they packaged it in steps. They didn't do that when we were kids!! My daughter liked how you could switch to ti fiti and that the boat had a storage area!
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Package, Complete Fun
customer_reviews.text: This LEGO Moana set was Just What our granddaughter wanted . All the parts were there and she stayed up late to finish it the night she got it. What more can be said about it? 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Papa C

customer_reviews.title: one of the best sets I've seen!
customer_reviews.text: We have many Disney character sets for my daughter and this one is my favorite. Loved that they included Hea-hea. Design is clever and it was fun for my 5 year old daughter and I (mostly *I*) to put together.

customer_reviews.text: This is a nice Lego set. The boat and figure have a lot of play value for my daughter however the island piece doesn't get used much.

customer_reviews.title: Liked it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Liked it a lot. I build legos with my 5 yr old daughter. She alsoloves moana and still plays with this every other day or so. Not overly challenging but has some tricky parts for her. It has moana, Maui and YeaYe. Wish it had Pua as well but understand the pig wasn't on that boat. Oh well.

customer_reviews.title: Maui looks great and Moana looks good as a minidoll
customer_reviews.text: With the discounted price here on Amazon, you cannot go wrong with this set. Maui looks great and Moana looks good as a minidoll. The build was fun and you also get a couple of Kaucamora (spelling?) and HeyHey the rooster. I give this set 4 stars because Maui's hook looks kinda weak. Wish Lego would have made a custom one instead of the build. Photographically speaking, the boat and Moana seems to be good to shoot. Maui being a bigfig is a bit more difficult to pose and take pictures of.

product_meta.title: LEGO Disney Princess Moana's Ocean Voyage 41150 Disney Moana Toy
product_meta.description: Discover the vibrant world of Disney Moana and join her on her epic adventure to bring back the heart of Te Fiti and restore harmony. This beautiful sailboat with opening storage under the deck, and Island with transformation function, are perfect for recreating iconic scenes from the movie or creating new stories by the sea. This LEGO l Disney toy features a Moana mini-doll, Maui big figure, Heihei and two Kakamora.
feature_bullets: Build Disney Princess Moana’s Ocean Voyage canoe with sail, opening deck, and a transforming Island of Te Fiti!
Featured in the award-winning Disney movie: Moana
Includes Moana mini-doll figure, Maui big figure, HeiHei the rooster, two buildable Kakamora pirates, plus a map, a catapult for the Kakamora, and the Heart of Te Fiti
LEGO Disney Princess building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars488 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
